title: Truth Gaming LF SMR
body:
Hello there, Truth Gaming are now looking for a Social Media Representative to take on the Facebook page, Youtube channel and Twitter.

If you have any past experience with managing social media pages that'd be great!

We will be taking applicants for the next week, and then coming to a decision in the leadership meeting next Friday evening, on the 30th March.

If interested, please send a short description of yourself, any experiences you've had managing social media pages, and anyone that can give you positive feedback to the page https://www.facebook.com/Truth-Gaming-Esports-852443294869873/

replies.body: The post you're referencing was made by Raging Knights Esports, not Truth Gaming. Raging Knights are already established in other games so already had those positions filled before recruiting for League.
I'm sorry, but what post was this? and how long ago was it?
The reply they're talking about was to/from Raging Knights Esports, not Truth Gaming.
